title.narrative: Center for Kirkeligt Udviklingssamarbejde (CKU) - pool grants related to religious liberty (tros- og religionsfrihed)

description.narrative: CKU - Pool grants concerning efforts related to religious liberty.

The main purpose of the window for Freedom of Religion or Belief (FoRB) is to finance projects that increase respect, protection, and promotion of FoRB. The project must be in agreement with and support the Danish government's strategy for FoRB.
Center for Church-Based Development administers the FoRB, which is a new funding oppertunity from 2020, which is also open to Danish civil society organisations - faith-based as well as non faith-based - who are not members of (CKU).
Find more information regarding the Center for Church-Based Development and the window for Freedom of Religion or Belief window here:
https://cku.dk/en/knowledge-center/freedom-of-religion-and-belief/
